scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r src/kb/*.json lib/kb/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build-prod: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r src/kb/*.json lib/kb/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run build:tests && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "npx mocha --no-config --require source-map-support/register lib/test/test_setup.js lib/test/parser.unit.test.js lib/test/validators.unit.test.js"
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:tests && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions,auth "npx mocha --no-config --require source-map-support/register lib/test/integration.evaluation-request-mapping.test.js lib/test/integration.evaluation-and-review.test.js lib/test/integration.review-a11y.test.js --timeout 50000"
scripts.test:watch: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/**/*.test.ts --watch"
scripts.test:load: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/load-testing.test.ts --timeout 30000"
scripts.test:chaos: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/chaos-testing.test.ts --timeout 60000"
scripts.test:e2e: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions,auth "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/e2e-user-journeys.test.ts --timeout 60000"
scripts.test:recovery: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/recovery-testing.test.ts --timeout 40000"
scripts.test:performance: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions "npx mocha --no-config -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/test/test_setup.ts src/test/performance-metrics.test.ts --timeout 40000"
